skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des: Restless Killers and Mysteries with Roger Heilig is a captivating podcast hosted by Jenny, delving into chilling cold case mysteries and baffling enigmas. Join Jenny as she guides listeners through the most intriguing cases, unearthing unsolved crimes and perplexing events that have gripped the world. Each episode is a journey into the realms of curiosity, conspiracy theories, and historical mysteries, leaving no stone unturned in the quest for truth and understanding. From the eerie slopes of Dyatlov Pass to other spine-tingling tales, Jenny explores the depths of human curiosity, skepticism, and fascination with the unknown. Prepare to be enthralled, entertained, and enlightened as Restless Killers and Mysteries takes you on a thrilling ride through the enigmatic world of unresolved secrets and unexplained phenomena. Subscribe now and join the circle of inquiry and confusion as Jenny unravels mysteries that will keep you on the edge of your seat. Keep your mind sharp, your ears open, and your curiosity alive as you delve into the chilling narratives that await in each episode of Restless Killers and Mysteries with Roger Heilig.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
